00100             function                get_reviews_for_object( &$BlockSettings )
00101             {
00102                   try
00103                   {
00104                         $MasterId = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00105                         $MasterType = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00106 
00107                         return( $this->ReviewAlgorithms->get_records_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType ) );
00108                   }
00109                   catch( Exception $e )
00110                   {
00111                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00137             function                compile_reviews( &$Reviews )
00138             {
00139                   try
00140                   {
00141                         if( isset( $Reviews[ 0 ] ) )
00142                         {
00143                               $ReviewLine = '';
00144 
00145                               $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/default_review_template.tpl';
00146                               
00147                               foreach( $Reviews as $i => $Review )
00148                               {
00149                                     $ReviewLine .= $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00150                                     $ReviewLine  = $this->String->print_record( $ReviewLine , $Review );
00151                               }
00152                               
00153                               return( $ReviewLine );
00154                         }
00155                         else
00156                         {
00157                               return( '{lang:reviews_were_not_found}' );
00158                         }
00159                   }
00160                   catch( Exception $e )
00161                   {
00162                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00163                   }
00164             }

00192             function                process_review_line( $Str , $Changed )
00193             {
00194                   try
00195                   {
00196                         $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00197                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'review_line' , $Limitations ) ; )
00198                         {
00199                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00200                               $Reviews = $this->get_reviews_for_object( $this->BlockSettings );
00201                   
00202                               $Code = $this->compile_reviews( $Reviews );
00203                               
00204                               $Str = str_replace( "{review_line:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00205                               $Changed = true;
00206                         }
00207                         
00208                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00209                   }
00210                   catch( Exception $e )
00211                   {
00212                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00213                   }
00214             }

00242             function                process_review_form( $Str , $Changed )
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00247                         
00248                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'review_form' , $Limitations ) ; )
00249                         {
00250                               $Code = '';
00251                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00252                               $MasterId = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00253                               $MasterType = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00254                               
00255                               if( $this->ReviewAlgorithms->review_creation_allowed( $MasterId , $MasterType ) )
00256                               {
00257                                     $Code = '{direct_controller:package_name=review::review_controller;meta=meta_create_review;'.
00258                                                       "master_type=$MasterType;master_id=$MasterId;direct_create=1}".
00259                                                 '{direct_view:package_name=review::review_view;meta=meta_create_review_form;'.
00260                                                       "master_type=$MasterType;master_id=$MasterId;direct_create=1}";
00261                               }
00262                               $Str = str_replace( "{review_form:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00263                               $Changed = true;
00264                         }
00265                         
00266                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00267                   }
00268                   catch( Exception $e )
00269                   {
00270                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00271                   }
00272             }

00360                   {
